original_title: You're Invited to Mary-Kate and Ashley's Mall Party
overview: Mary-Kate & Ashley are singing, dancing and shopping their way around America's largest mall, the Mall of America. Grab your shopping bag and get ready to take off because the girls want you to be part of all the funâ€”from the fashion to the music to the roller coasters to the bumper cars.
title: You're Invited to Mary-Kate and Ashley's Mall Party
